name: Superroom
0:
”Alexa, set the [user thermostat device name] to [available mode].”
”Alexa, turn on the living room TV.”
”Alexa, set the blinds to pause.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect Alexa to your iCLICK Devices by following these steps:

Own the AI Hub equipment and Super Remote Control in hand.

Download the iCLICK Android or iOS app.

Sing-in into the App.
Provision the device by following the on-screen instructions.
Give some user friendly name to your device. This same name will show up in Alexa.
In the Alexa App, Search for the "Superroom" skill.
Click on "Enable skill" and sign-in using the same credentials you used in the iCLICK App.
Once the linking is successful, allow Alexa to discover your devices.
Once the devices are successfully discovered, the setup is complete and you can controlling them using Alexa.
Following controls are supported

One, Switch Control:
"Alexa, turn on the SONY TV."
"Alexa, turn off the TV."
"Alexa, turn off the living room TV."

Supported Control ：Key naming requirements (case insensitive)
Power On ：The key name should be ON or Power On
Power Off ：The key name should be OFF or Power Off
Power Toggle ：The key name should be Power


Two, Channel Control:
"Alexa, set SONY TV to channel 2."
"Alexa, channel up on the TV."

Supported Control ：Key naming requirements (case insensitive)
Channel+ ：The key name should be CH+
Channel- ：The key name should be CH-


Three, Volume Control:
"Alexa, mute Living Room TV."
"Alexa, turn the volume down on Living Room TV."

Supported Control ：Key naming requirements (case insensitive)
Mute ：The key name should be Mute
Volume+ ：The key name should be Vol+ or Volume+
Volume- ：The key name should be Vol- or Volume-


Four, Curtain Control:
"Alexa, open the blinds."
"Alexa, close the blinds."
"Alexa, set the blinds to pause" Supported Control ：Key naming requirements (case insensitive)
Open ：The key name should be On or Open
Close ：The key name should be Off or Close
Pause ：The key name should be Pause or Stop


Five, Fan Speed Control:
"Alexa, set air conditioner speed to auto/low/medium/high."
"Alexa, turn up the speed on the Living Room Fan."

Supported Control ：Key naming requirements (case insensitive)
Fan Speed ：The key name should be Fan or Speed or Fan Speed or Wind Speed
Low Speed ：The key name should be low or low speed
Medium Speed ： The key name should be medium or medium speed
High Speed ：The key name should be high or high speed
Auto Speed：The key name should be AUTO 


Six, Fan Shake Head Control:
"Alexa, turn on Oscillate on the Living Room Fan."

Supported Control ：Key naming requirements (case insensitive）
Oscillate ： Shake head or Shake or Oscillate or Rotate or Swing


Seven, AC or Thermostat Mode Control:
"Alexa, set the [user thermostat device name] to [available mode]."
available mode: cool heat auto off


Eight, AC or Thermostat Temp control
"Alexa, set the [user thermostat device name] to twenty five degrees."
